DOC.brief_summary: This study design order know effect 12 week aerobic exercise training migraine prevention . We hypothesize exercise training could reduce number day migraine number attack per month treat group .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Aerobic Exercise Training Migraine Prevention .
DOC.detailed_description: The study cover 20 week . The first 8 week design `` baseline '' period , assess migraine status classification , colect blood exam , perform cardiopulmonary exercise test determine maximal oxygen uptake , fill psychometric questionnaire . The remain 12 week `` intervention '' period , participant randomization allocate perform aerobic exercise training ( treadmill ) perform 3 time per week-based program 40-min duration session , wait equal period repeat assessment , begin exercise protocol .
DOC.criteria: Sedentary ( > 6 month ) healthy subject sedentary ( > 6 month ) subject migraine without aura , migraine aura chronic migraine ; Physically active ( > 1 day/week ) ; Tobacco user ; Alcohol abuse drug user ; Taking prescribed medication , case medication migraine prevention , take < 6 month . Having cardiovascular , pulmonary , endocrinemetabolic , rheumatic neurologic disease psychiatric disorder bipolar disorder posttraumatic stress disorder . Undergoing surgical procedure le 3 month enter study .
